"Marimo": "You must be... one of the recent arrivals in Stia, yes?"
"Have you been holding up well against the heat? Please remember to hydrate yourself before battle."
"Enemy or not, it would be rather dangerous to collapse out there in this kind of heat."
"I am Marimo. I've been researching Stia's environment."
"Stia is a terribly dangerous place, so I've been gathering information on how to make things easier for everyone."
"If you don't mind, would you be able to help me with my research?"
"There's a place I'd like you to travel to in my stead, you see."
"There's a very mysterious island here in Stia's Fringes, you see."
"I would like to learn more about that island, so would you go there and record some data for me?"
"I see... Well then, perhaps another time, yes?"
